Hello,

I am new to this list and to the sword study.  I am trying to learn 
about swordmaking.  I want to learn to be able to forge swords using 
the traditional methods.  I live near Orlando, Florida and seem to 
be having trouble finding educational resources.  Any help that 
anyone can provide will be greatly appreciated.

Mike
